availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Nancy Hollan. Father of Mahala Hollan, William B. Hollan, Yancey J. Hollan, Robert W. Hollan, James H. Hollan, and Mary E. Hollan. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 34B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 333-4.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 305A.
Find A Grave, "Henderson Hollan (3 Sep 1811-23 Nov 1889)," Memorial #126101387, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/126101387(accessed September 17, 2020).
